page.title: 20DOCTOR'S SURGERY
page.content: There has been a doctor's surgery in Great Witley since{1827}and the {Johnson}family have owned the practice since{1940.}At present there are three doctors, three part-time secretaries and dispensers,one ancilliary and one part-time receptionist. The practice serves an{area}of approx: {10 miles radius}from Great Witley, and has approx:{4000}patients. {Surgeries}are held{twice daily}at Great Witley and there are branch surgeries at Martley and Clifton-on-Teme. The practice also {dispenses}its own{medicines. Patients needing hospital treatment are sent to{Worcester Royal Infirmary. The practice is at present in the process of expanding.They are planning to build a new surgery to include accomodation for a treatment room for district nurses.
